sn20.10:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu ativelaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjati.
sn20.10:1.5: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno na viramati.
sn20.10:1.6: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn20.10:1.7: “idha, bhante, aññataro bhikkhu ativelaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjati.
sn20.10:1.10: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno na viramatī”ti.
sn20.10:2.1: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, biḷāro sandhisamalasaṅkaṭīre ṭhito ahosi mudumūsiṁ maggayamāno:
sn20.10:2.2: ‘yadāyaṁ mudumūsi gocarāya pakkamissati, tattheva naṁ gahetvā khādissāmī’ti.
sn20.10:2.3: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, mudumūsi gocarāya pakkāmi.
sn20.10:2.4: Tamenaṁ biḷāro gahetvā sahasā saṅkhāditvā ajjhohari.
sn20.10:2.5: Tassa so mudumūsi antampi khādi, antaguṇampi khādi.
sn20.10:2.6: So tatonidānaṁ maraṇampi nigacchi maraṇamattampi dukkhaṁ.
sn20.10:3.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati arakkhiteneva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya arakkhitena cittena, anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā, asaṁvutehi indriyehi.
sn20.10:3.2: So tattha passati mātugāmaṁ dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā.
sn20.10:3.3: Tassa mātugāmaṁ disvā dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
sn20.10:3.4: So rāgānuddhaṁsena cittena maraṇaṁ vā nigacchati maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
sn20.10:3.5: Maraṇañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yo sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
sn20.10:3.6: Maraṇamattañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ yadidaṁ aññataraṁ saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
sn20.10:3.9: ‘rakkhiteneva kāyena rakkhitāya vācāya rakkhitena cittena, upaṭṭhitāya satiyā, saṁvutehi indriyehi gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā’ti.
